detail_desc: Jacket in washed denim with embroidered appliqués and sparkly stones. Collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button and tabs with adjustable buttoning at the hem.

Jacket in a glossy weave with a detachable, jersey-lined hood and fleece-lined stand-up collar. Zip down the front, flap front pockets, and an adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in washed denim with a tie belt at the waist and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, back pockets and wide legs with wide turn-ups at the hems.
Ankle-length denim trousers with a high waist, zip fly, side pockets and fake back pockets. Straight-cut legs that taper to the hem, and a slit at the front of the hems.
V-neck jumper in a soft knit containing alpaca wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Joggers in a sturdy, patterned jacquard weave with elastication and ties at the waist.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.

Short pile jacket with a large collar, zip down the front, concealed side pockets and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Calf-length dress in soft jersey with a frilled V-neck and a seam and ties under the bust and 3/4-length sleeves with a frill at the cuffs.

Ankle-length, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with appliqués at the top and hard-worn details. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, cut-off, raw-edge hems.
V-neck blouse in airy, patterned viscose with lacing at the top and long, wide sleeves with a frill trim at the cuffs.

Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with a motif on the front, buttons on one shoulder, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, wide blouse in plumeti chiffon with an opening at the front and short sleeves with flared flounces. Opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam at the hem with a double flounce.

Braided leather sandals with an adjustable heel strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles.

Leather sandals with crossover straps at the top, an adjustable fastening and metal buckle at the heel, leather insoles and rubber soles.
Leather ballet pumps with grained sections in a contrasting colour, elastic straps over the foot and a bow at the back. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Shimmering metallic leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastener. Leather insoles and rubber soles.

Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, narrow, adjustable straps that can be fastened in different ways. Elastication at the hem and a metal fastener at the back.

Triangle bikini top with lined cups, laser-cut, scalloped edges and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can also be fastened across the back. Wide elasticated hem and a metal fastener at the back.
